summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2024, for the improvement of 30th Avenue South from Judkins Street to the south margin of All Around View Addition, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20429 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
